values:
It is official. KASSY DOES NOT UPDATE HER LIVEJOURNAL. 

This is a very sad occurrence. What am I to do? Uh, apparently she does look at this journal, but she doesn't log in and post, or so she says. So, uh...hmm...

COMMENT AND TELL HER YOUR FAVORITE THING ABOUT HER. I'm sure she'll appreciate it.

XOXO
Alison

P.S. APS SUCK MAJOR ASS!!!!!!! ANYONE AGREE?

HALLO ALL KASSY JOURNAL READERS! Yes, it is Alison again. I bet all of you who don't know me are thinking, god, why does this girl keep updating Kassy's journal? Haha. Well, as most of you know, my dear Kassy is in Sweden!! I am sure that she's having a blast.

I am posting to let Kassy know that when she gets back, me and Ashley are planning a party for her return and her birthday!!!!! My best friend is about to turn 17, and we must celebrate it!!!!!!! So, if all of you on her friends list would like to wish her a happy early birthday, I'm sure she'd really appreciate it.

I LOVE KASSY!!!!!!!!!!!

<marquee>KASSY IS MY BEST FRIEND FOR LIFE!!!!!</marquee>

♥♥♥♥


EDIT: I got you a userpic!!!!!! Hope you like it!!!! Hehe Kass, you're welcome!!!

Hey everyone it's Alison again. I'm updating for Kassy because she never updates. It makes me sad, I'm sure all of you on her friends list are sad as well to lack the knowledge of Kassy's wonderful life. Speaking of which...I actually have no idea what's going on in Kassy's life right now, just that she is on the girls' soccer team and that she hasn't called me in fucking forever!!!!! AHHHHHHH!!!!!! Ok I'm done. But seriously, call me. And update. So I don't have to keep doing it. LOL.

Alright everyone. Oh, btw, ENGLAND ROCKS! Best accents, music, humor, and how about British guys? Aren't they so fucking hot? If you did not answer yes then you are wrong. And shouldn't be reading this journal. So get the fuck off. I don't want Kassy associating with you. 

Haha sorry JK. But I ♥ England. Anyone who knows me knows that.

Ok I'm done updating. Love to Kassy!

Kassy wanted me to update and tell everyone that...

SHE BOUGHT HER PLANE TICKET TO SWEDEN!!!

Yay!!!

So everyone rejoice. Yeah.

LOL. Love ya Kassy.

♥
Alison!

Alison u made this whole live journal for me!!!!! Thats the sweetest thing ive ever seen in my life!   

You pimped this shit up for me like no other.... you must love Sweden just as much as me ;) lol

Hey this is Alison updating for Kassy. I customized her journal so it looks really cool!!!! Yeah, you'd better like it cuz it is awesome.

Kassy is one of my bestest friends in the whole world and I love her soooooooooooo much!!!!!

So yeah- Kassy's journal just got 1000% cooler.

Alright.  

Today i did work... fine, i admit it... i was writing my proposal for my trip to Sweden this March!  Ugh, im so sick in the head lol

...EVER!


Went to Beveraly Hills High and saw a dance show with Alison.... tight...
